Trade/Device Name(s): S TEST Reagent Cartridge Alkaline Phosphatase (ALP)
Regulation Name(s): Alkaline Phosphatase or isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for S TEST Reagent Cartridge Alkaline Phosphatase (ALP) on Hitachi Clinical Analyzer for quantitative measurement of alkaline phosphatase activity.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of alkaline phosphatase activity in serum, lithium heparinized plasma, or sodium citrate plasma using the HITACHI Clinical Analyzer; used in diagnosis and treatment of liver, bone, parathyroid, and intestinal diseases.
